languages.text: {n}Вокс оживает — к вам обращается кормчий Равор.{/n} "Тут вот что, Лорд-капитан... сразу, может, и не заметно, но тут вот в местном астероидном поле сидит пустотный корабль. Тихо так сидит, словно специально поглубже забрался. Ну и, в общем, не удивлен я — ему больше описание "разбитое корыто" подходит. Кто-то ой как хорошо его потрепал. Фиксируем критические повреждения корпуса и разгерметизацию нескольких отсеков. О, а теперь еще и входящая передача есть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс оживает — к вам обращается кормчий Равор.{/n} "Тут вот что, Лорд-капитан... сразу, может, и не заметно, но тут вот в местном астероидном поле сидит пустотный корабль. Тихо так сидит, словно специально поглубже забрался. Ну и, в общем, не удивлен я — ему больше описание "разбитое корыто" подходит. Кто-то ой как хорошо его потрепал. Фиксируем критические повреждения корпуса и разгерметизацию нескольких отсеков. О, а теперь еще и входящая передача есть".

languages.text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс оживает — к вам обращается кормчий Равор.{/n} "Тут вот что, Лорд-капитан... сразу, может, и не заметно, но тут вот в местном астероидном поле сидит пустотный корабль. Тихо так сидит, словно специально поглубже забрался. Ну и, в общем, не удивлен я — ему больше описание "разбитое корыто" подходит. Кто-то ой как хорошо его потрепал. Фиксируем критические повреждения корпуса и разгерметизацию нескольких отсеков. О, а теперь еще и входящая передача есть".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox crackles to life and Chief Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "Here is a thing, Lord Captain... It is not very obvious, but there is a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, as if it huddled in there on purpose. It is not like I am surprised, the thing is more of a piece of junk than a ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on that thing. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurization of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

languages.text: {n}Le système-vox grésille brièvement avant de laisser entendre la voix du maître timonier Ravor.{/n} « Nous avons quelque chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... C'est à la limite du seuil de détection, mais il y a bien un vaisseau dans le champ d'astéroïdes du système. Il se fait extrêmement discret, à tel point qu'on serait en droit de penser qu'il se cache. Cela dit, ça n'aurait rien de surprenant : cet appareil tient plus de l'épave qu'autre chose. Quelqu'un lui a fait passer un sale quart d'heure. D'après nos relevés, la coque a subi des dégâts importants et plusieurs compartiments sont dépressurisés. Oh, et nous venons d'intercepter une transmission. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le système-vox grésille brièvement avant de laisser entendre la voix du maître timonier Ravor.{/n} « Nous avons quelque chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... C'est à la limite du seuil de détection, mais il y a bien un vaisseau dans le champ d'astéroïdes du système. Il se fait extrêmement discret, à tel point qu'on serait en droit de penser qu'il se cache. Cela dit, ça n'aurait rien de surprenant : cet appareil tient plus de l'épave qu'autre chose. Quelqu'un lui a fait passer un sale quart d'heure. D'après nos relevés, la coque a subi des dégâts importants et plusieurs compartiments sont dépressurisés. Oh, et nous venons d'intercepter une transmission. »

languages.text: {n}Das Vox erwacht knisternd zum Leben, und Hauptsteuermann Ravor spricht zu dir.{/n} "Was wir hier haben, Lord Captain ... Es ist kaum zu bemerken, doch in dem lokalen Asteroidenfeld sitzt ein Raumschiff. Es ist extrem still, als habe es sich absichtlich dort versteckt. Was mich aber nicht wundert, das Ding gleicht inzwischen eher einem Schrotthaufen als einem Schiff. Da kannte jemand keine Gnade. Wir registrieren kritischen Schaden am Rumpf und einen Druckabfall in mehreren Modulen. Oh, jetzt geht gerade eine Übertragung ein."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox erwacht knisternd zum Leben, und der Leitende Steuermann Ravor spricht zu dir.{/n} "Was wir hier haben, Lord Captain ... Es ist kaum zu bemerken, doch in dem lokalen Asteroidenfeld sitzt ein Raumschiff. Es ist extrem still, als habe es sich absichtlich dort versteckt. Was mich aber nicht wundert, das Ding gleicht inzwischen eher einem Schrotthaufen als einem Schiff. Da kannte jemand keine Gnade. Wir registrieren kritischen Schaden am Rumpf und einen Druckabfall in mehreren Modulen. Oh, jetzt geht gerade eine Übertragung ein."

{n}Das Vox erwacht knisternd zum Leben, und der Leitende Steuermann Ravor spricht zu dir.{/n} "Was wir hier haben, Lord Captain ... Es ist kaum zu bemerken, doch in dem lokalen Asteroidenfeld sitzt ein Raumschiff. Es ist extrem still, als habe es sich absichtlich dort versteckt. Was mich aber nicht wundert, das Ding gleicht inzwischen eher einem Schrotthaufen als einem Schiff. Da kannte jemand keine Gnade. Wir registrieren kritischen Schaden am Rumpf und einen Druckabfall in mehreren Modulen. Oh, jetzt geht gerade eine Übertragung ein."

languages.text: {n}El voco produce un chasquido de activación y escuchas la voz de Ravor, el maestro timonel.{/n} «Lo que tenemos aquí, Lord Capitán... Es difícil de apreciar, pero hay una nave del vacío dentro del campo del asteroides de la zona. No hace nada; parece que se ha detenido ahí a propósito. Aunque no me sorprende, porque está tan destrozada que parece irrecuperable. Es posible que alguien le haya metido un buen viaje. Hemos detectado daños críticos en el casco y la despresurización de varios compartimentos. Ah, y también está llegando una transmisión».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco produce un chasquido de activación y escuchas la voz de Ravor, el maestro timonel.{/n} «Lo que tenemos aquí, Lord Capitán... Es difícil de apreciar, pero hay una nave del vacío dentro del campo del asteroides de la zona. No hace nada; parece que se ha detenido ahí a propósito. Aunque no me sorprende, porque está tan destrozada que parece irrecuperable. Es posible que alguien le haya metido un buen viaje. Hemos detectado daños críticos en el casco y la despresurización de varios compartimentos. Ah, y también está llegando una transmisión».

languages.text: {n}音阵装置响了起来，舵手长雷沃发来了通讯内容。{/n}“看看这是什么啊，船长老大……有艘虚空舰正停在当地的小行星带里，不怎么显眼。它一点动静都没有，就像故意缩在那里一样。老实说，我不意外，这玩意儿与其说是飞船，不如说是堆废铁，肯定是什么人狠狠地收拾了它一顿。我们发现船体受到严重破坏，好几个舱室都在减压。噢，现在还有信号传过来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置响了起来，舵手长雷沃发来了通讯内容。{/n}“看看这是什么啊，船长老大……有艘虚空舰正停在当地的小行星带里，不怎么显眼。它一点动静都没有，就像故意缩在那里一样。老实说，我不意外，这玩意儿与其说是飞船，不如说是堆废铁，肯定是什么人狠狠地收拾了它一顿。我们发现船体受到严重破坏，好几个舱室都在减压。噢，现在还有信号传过来了。”

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスが鳴り響き、マスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアがあなたに話しかける。{/n}「これはこれは、ロード・キャプテン…目立ちませんが、小惑星帯にヴォイドシップが一隻、ひっそりと潜んでおります。まるで、わざとそこに身を寄せているかのようです。驚きはしませんがね。もはや船というよりも鉄くずですから。何者かが容赦なく攻撃したのでしょう。船体に致命的な損傷があり、一部の区画が減圧されています。おっと、通信も入ってきました」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスが鳴り響き、マスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアがあなたに話しかける。{/n}「これはこれは、ロード・キャプテン…目立ちませんが、小惑星帯にヴォイドシップが一隻、ひっそりと潜んでおります。まるで、わざとそこに身を寄せているかのようです。驚きはしませんがね。もはや船というよりも鉄くずですから。何者かが容赦なく攻撃したのでしょう。船体に致命的な損傷があり、一部の区画が減圧されています。おっと、通信も入ってきました」

languages.text: {n}Vokstan çıtırtılar yükseliyor. Başserdümen Ravor sana sesleniyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, burada karşı karşıya olduğumuz şey... Zar zor fark edilir bir şey ancak yerel asteroit bölgesinde duran bir uçsuz gemisi var. Sessizce bekliyor ve sanki buraya kasıtlı olarak sokulmuş gibi. Şaşırdığımı söyleyemem, gemiden çok metal bir hurda yığınına benziyor. Birileri üzerine fena çullanmış. Gövdesine kritik hasar aldığını ve bazı kompartımanlarının basıncının kaybedildiğini kaydettik. Aa, şimdi bir ileti geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox crackles to life, and Master Helmsman Ravor addresses you.{/n} "What we have here, Lord Cap'n... It is not very noticeable, but there's a voidship sitting in the local asteroid field. It sure is quiet, like it's huddled up in there on purpose. It's not like I am surprised, the thing is more scrapheap than ship at this point. Somebody sure went to town on it. We are registering critical damage to the hull and depressurisation of several compartments. Oh, there is an incoming transmission now, too."
